summary: This this a Daedric arrow with a delayed icy explosion. Does not explode on impact.
descriptionHtml:
It is a explosive Daedric arrow (Freezing Daedric Arrow)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
V.1
-An Explosive Daedric Arrow
-Not for indoor use
-Not for close quarter combat
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The arrow has an explosive tip and explodes on impact (icy explosion)
The arrow also emits a Ice Blue light when in flight for easy-night time-tracking.
There is a recipe in Whiterun Bannered Mare Inn with some arrows for you to try out.
Please note that you will need the Daedra smiting perk in order to be able to create the Freezing Daedric Arrow.

This mod does not affect other arrows and should be compatible with other arrow and weapon mods.

This arrow is different though, besides of the lights- it has a delay timer and will not explode on impact
so you can shoot the arrow unto the ground in front of your enemy or a group of enemies and it has a chance 
to injure a few of them at the same time.

There is still one thing I am trying to figure out, how to hit an enemy and get an delayed explosion.



I would like it if you check out my other arrow mod \"Hot Daedric Arrow\" which is explosive on impact, and endorse if you like.

There will be some updates.

- Non explosive glowing arrows- with different types of colors
- Other types of explosive effects. 

Thanks, Hulk9111.
author: Hulk9111
